overview: Will's best friend and roommate Belcher, a party bum slacker, returns from the dead as a cocky, mischievous, and perverted ghost. He soon discovers his cousin, Krista, has shacked up and moved in with his best friend, Will. Belcher will do anything and everything to destroy this relationship and get his prank buddy back.
tagline: They were the best of times. They were the worst of times...
title: Living Will...
